Class WiFiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • WiFiController
  • public class WiFiController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing Wi-Fi communication with an ESP8266 module. Handles the GUI interface and network communication for a token sorting system, based on color.
    Author:
    Dejana S.

        private static final java.lang.String ESP8266_IP

      • sleep

        private void sleep()
        Pauses the current thread for a fixed duration (1 second).

      • startServer

        private void startServer()
        Starts the TCP server to listen for ESP8266 connections. Runs in a separate thread to avoid blocking the UI.

      • stopServer

        private void stopServer()
        Stops the TCP server and cleans up resources.

                       throws java.io.IOException
        Clears the input buffer to remove any pending data.
        Throws:
